org.mini2Dx.core.engine.geom

Class StaticCollisionCircle

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.geom.Shape
      • org.mini2Dx.core.geom.Circle
        • org.mini2Dx.core.engine.geom.StaticCollisionCircle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CollisionShape, Positionable, Sizeable, Updatable

    public class StaticCollisionCircle
extends Circle
implements CollisionShape
    A Circle implementation of CollisionShape that does not need to be updated/interpolated. More lightweight than using a CollisionCircle for static collisions.
